actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit heads of households to use the standard deduction used by married persons.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow heads of households the same zero bracket amount ($3,200) as allowed married couples filing jointly.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit heads of households to use the standard deduction used by married persons.
